title: Cognitive Load Measurement and Optimization Strategies in Simulation-Based Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: A process combining simulation practice and theoretical learning using digital devices, applying segment/pause and debriefing techniques to analyze learners' cognitive load

learning_goals: Learners distinguish and measure intrinsic/extraneous/germane cognitive load occurring during simulation practice using the CLAS-Sim tool
Learners propose optimized instructional designs by applying segmenting/pausing and debriefing techniques to cognitive load
Learners quantitatively evaluate simulation training effectiveness by comparing Paas scale results with CLAS-Sim outcomes
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
